extension.summary: A powerful EPG add-on with many extra features. Streaming support via multiple live TV addons.
extension.description: A comprehensive EPG that is compatible with many popular live TV addons. [CR]Up to 7 days of listings with automatic triggering of your favourite live TV addons.[CR]As well as the EPG. Props to Spoyser, Dixie Dean and Twinther for the original code used in this guide.
